name: Duc Le
bio:
I am a passionate researcher and developer specializing in machine learning and computer vision. With a background in computer science and artificial intelligence, I am dedicated to advancing the field of AI and making it more accessible to everyone.

My research interests include deep learning, computer vision, and natural language processing. I am particularly excited about the intersection of AI and healthcare, where I believe significant innovations can occur.

When I'm not coding or researching, you can find me reading scientific papers, contributing to open-source projects, or exploring new technologies.

education.description: Extensive experience in Explainable AI (XAI), trustworthy AI, and management, particularly in risk detection in the medical field. Expertise in Federated Learning and security. Activities: Volleyball, badminton, karate. Grade: 8.6.

experience.title: AI Lead
experience.description:
Leading AI initiatives from strategy to deployment. Key contributions include: 
- Developing intelligent Chatbots to automate support and boost engagement.
- Building customer intelligence platforms for actionable insights.
- Architecting AI Agent systems for enterprise database management.
- Driving AI research to enhance efficiency and business growth.

experience.title: AI Engineer
experience.description: Designed and delivered AI-powered solutions with impact on core business goals, including Chatbots, customer intelligence platforms, and AI Agents for enterprise data access.

experience.title: AI Researcher
experience.description: Mentored research in Explainable AI for Computer Vision. Focused on interpretability techniques and evaluation methods, bridging NLP and Computer Vision.

experience.title: AI Researcher
experience.description: Developed and evaluated Vietnamese LLMs, improving understanding, generation, and cultural adaptation.

slogan: I believe one good line of code can change how we think.
